Article Title: Vinesh Phogat lied just to enter politics, says BJP MP
Article Text:
Commonwealth Games medal winner and Congress MLA Vinesh Phogat (Pic credit: PTI)

JIND: BJP Rajya Sabha MP and former National Commission for Women chairperson Rekha Sharma on Monday claimed that Commonwealth Games medal winner and Congress MLA Vinesh Phogat lied about certain things to enter politics.Without naming anyone against whom Phogat levelled the allegations, Sharma said Phogat used this "false" narrative for her benefit, and this led her to become an MLA from Julana. Sharma made the claims when she was in Julana town of Jind district on Sunday to meet party workers in connection with urban local body elections in Haryana. Even as Sharma made the claims, a case of sexual harassment against Wrestling Federation of India former chief Brij Bhushan Saran Singh is already in court. Vinesh had, along with wrestlers Bajrang Punia and Sakshi Malik, had sat on a protest for long to demand action against Brij Bhushan.A Delhi court had, in May last year, framed the charges of sexual harassment and using force to outrage women's modesty against Brij Bhushan in the criminal case filed against him by the female wrestlers.After she had been disqualified from the Paris Olympics last year, Vinesh had also accused Indian Olympics Association president P T Usha of not providing her enough support. Sharma also accused Phogat of making statements that were "detrimental to Indian society and govt". "The govt supported her, and the case she filed against someone is in court, and that person in question will be punished," said Sharma.She added Phogat turned all of this into a political issue to make her entry into politics. "This is my first visit to Julana. Perhaps I should have come earlier. That was a mistake. The seat we lost, we wouldn't have lost if I came sooner," she said.Two months ago, Sharma was elected unopposed to the Rajya Sabha from Haryana. She replaced the state's rural development and panchayat minister Krishna Lal Panwar, who resigned from his Rajya Sabha seat after being elected as the MLA from Israna in Panipat. The term of a Rajya Sabha MP is six years, but Sharma's term will be three and a half years, lasting until August 1, 2028, as the remaining term was completed by Panwar.
Article Summary: Rekha sharma claims commonwealth games medal winner vinesh phogat lied about certain things to enter politics. Sharma made the claims when she was in julana town of jind district on sunday to meet party workers in connection with urban local body elections in haryana.

Article Title: Taylor Swift faces backlash on Instagram, loses over 144,200 followers following her booing at the Super Bowl
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Taylor Swift has been sacked from Instagram after being booed at the Super Bowl

Taylor Swift has been facing backlash from Instagram after being booed at the Super Bowl, according to SportsMillions. Conservative fans, including Alexis Winters of Queens, believe the drop in followers and booing signals Swift should focus on music and avoid politics.Travis Kelce, boyfriend of Taylor Swift, has gained over 12,370 followers on Instagram following his Super Bowl loss to the Philadelphia Eagles, according to SportsMillions, which used Social Blade to track their social media stats.Taylor Swift's Instagram following has plummeted to over 144,200 followings following the Super Bowl LIX controversy , according to SportsMillions data, causing speculation about the reasons behind the backlash.Swift's presence at the Super Bowl, where she supported her boyfriend, Kansas City Chiefs tight end Travis Kelce, was met with mixed reactions. Some fans were excited to see her, while others expressed frustration, particularly those who disagree with her political stances. Some speculate it stems from her growing political influence.Alexis Winters, a member of the New York Young Republican Club, attributed the decrease in followers to a broader sentiment among certain conservative fans. "We are tired of celebrities calling down to us from their ivory towers, giving their two cents on policies that will never impact them," Winters stated.She further added, "Taylor Swift is simply the best example of this, and her loss of hundreds of thousands of Instagram followers represents the hundreds of thousands of Americans who chose their president over the woke Hollywood mob."While Taylor Swift's Instagram followers declined, Kelce gained over 12,370 followers after the Super Bowl, according to Social Blade tracking. Some fans argue that Swift's criticism is unfair, especially when compared to Kelce's reception. "I mostly think it's equally maddening and unsurprising how people seem more eager to celebrate the man dating a successful woman than the actual woman herself," said Sara Koger, 32, of Buckeye, Arizona.Jenna Piwowarczyk, a leader of the "Swifties for Trump" movement, expressed disappointment over Swift's treatment during the game. "When Travis made an appearance on the Eras Tour, Swifties were excited to see him and cheered him on. When Taylor was shown on the Jumbotron, she was booed," Piwowarczyk noted. "I understand the demographic of the Super Bowl attendees are not fans of Taylor Swift, but the generalized hatred towards her for simply supporting her boyfriend is uncalled for and gross."Also read: Travis Kelce‚Äôs ex Kayla Nicole stuns in a viral Fenty ad, blending seduction and empowerment that could make Taylor Swift nervous Taylor Swift's influence remains strong, with her Eras Tour becoming the highest-grossing concert tour of all time. Despite a drop in followers, her career shows no signs of slowing down, as her presence remains a powerful force in social media, sporting events, and the music industry, sparking conversation.
Article Summary: Travis kelce, boyfriend of taylor swift, has gained over 12,370 followers on instagram following his super bowl loss to the philadelphia eagles. Conservative fans, including alexis winters of queens, believe the drop in followers and booing signals swift should focus on music and avoid politics.

Article Title: Steve Smith Sr. is under scrutiny after allegations of an affair with Baltimore Ravens marching band member surfaced online
Article Text:
Image via Imagn Images

Steve Smith Sr. has been embroiled in a cheating scandal

Former Ravens wide receiver Steve Smith Sr. has been embroiled in a cheating scandal, with revelations coming from the husband of a Ravens employee who discovered explicit messages between his wife and Smith. The husband confronted Smith directly, capturing the exchange on video, and Smith's response was "I'm sorry." The scandal has captivated fans and critics, who are scrutinizing every detail of the scandal.Former NFL star and analyst Steve Smith Sr. is under scrutiny after allegations of an affair surfaced online, allegedly by Twitter user Tony Martinez. Martinez claims Smith was in a relationship with his wife, a member of the Baltimore Ravens' marching band.The deleted posts contained explicit text message screenshots and a video of a man claiming to be Smith being confronted in a phone call. "What do you have to say for yourself?" asked the caller. Upon being asked this question, the voice on the other end responded in a concise manner.Smith, 45, has not commented on allegations of alleged defamation, leaving the situation uncertain. The Twitter account that initially posted the accusations has been deleted, and it is possible that this could be a legal matter in the future. If the allegations are untrue, Smith could feel unfairly maligned and file a defamation lawsuit.The alleged affair between NFL player Jason Smith and wife Angie Smith is causing speculation. Smith, married since 2000 and a father of four, is expected to address the claims or remain silent amid the controversy. People are also examining if there was a crossover between Smith's employment with the Baltimore Ravens.Steve Smith Sr, a five-time Pro Bowl selection and three-time All-Pro, was a highly productive wide receiver in the NFL. He led the league in catches, receiving yards, and touchdowns in 2005. Smith played for the Panthers for thirteen seasons before signing with the Ravens in 2014. He is the Panthers' all-time leader in total touchdowns, receptions, and receiving yards.Also Read: ‚ÄúWhy would you go to the Raiders‚Äù: NFL analyst ruled out Tom Brady's Raiders as the favorite team to sign Aaron Rodgers Smith also became the 35th player in NFL history to amass 10,000 receiving yards in 2011. He ranked seventh in NFL career all-purpose yards, 14th in career receptions, and 25th in receiving touchdowns.
Article Summary: Former ravens wide receiver steve smith sr. has been embroiled in a cheating scandal. The scandal has captivated fans and critics, who are scrutinizing every detail of the scandal. Smith, married since 2000 and a father of four, is expected to address the claims or remain silent amid the controversy.

Article Title: Is Sidney Crosby taken? The details behind his 15-year relationship with famous model Kathy Leutner
Article Text:
Image via Joe Sargent/NHLI via Getty Images

Sidney Crosby‚Äôs Relationship Of FIfteen Years With Kathy Leutner That The Two Have Mostly Kept Private



Sidney Crosby , the star player and captain of Team Canada , won everyone‚Äôs hearts as he led the team to win the 4 Nations Face Off ‚Äôs final match against Team USA on Thursday. While everyone is applauding Sidney Crosby, he has liked to keep things away from the spotlight. The 37 year old star player is unmarried but there are a few speculations around his dating life and relationship rumours with his long time girlfriend Kathy Leutner .Kathy Leutner and Sidney Crosby crossed paths with each other when they were pretty young, way back in 2008, when they met through a mutual friend, as per a report by The Sun. Since then the two began dating each other but have mostly kept it out od the eyes of media.When Sidney Crosby began dating Kathy Leutner, the star player was only 21 years old and was just starting his career in the National Hockey League with his current team, the Pittsburgh Penguins. Sidney Crosby‚Äôs talent shone through and he quickly became a household name and soon the captain of the Pittsburgh Penguins and Kathy Leutner never left his side and kept supporting him throughout his career.As per Legit, Kathy Leutner grew up in Virginia but has moved her base to Nova Scotia in Canada. Kathy Leutner is a professional model and has been associated with a number of popular brands including Faviana, Famous, Hollister and Abercrombie & Fitch, as per The Sun.At this point in time, Sidney Crosby‚Äôs girlfriend of over fifteen years, Kathy Leutner is a pretty private person and does not have an account on social media. However, she has been spotted many times at stadiums cheering on for her boyfriend, the captain of Team Canada and Pittsburgh Penguins, Sidney Crosby.Sidney Crosby is being hailed as a hero for leading Team Canada‚Äôs win against Team USA at the 4 Nations Face Off‚Äôs final match. While Sidney Crosby keeps his girlfriend away from the spotlight, his fans are pretty excited about their future.Also Read: Connor McDavid opens up on Team Canada's win against Team USA after admitting to "not giving his best"
Article Summary: Sidney crosby is being hailed as a hero for leading team canada‚Äôs win against team usa at the 4 nations face off. The 37 year old star player is unmarried but there are a few speculations around his dating life and relationship rumours with his long time girlfriend kathy leutner.

Article Title: Auston Matthews gave a stern response when asked if Connor McDavid's winning goal at the 4 Nations Face-Off final haunted him
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Auston Matthews on Connor McDavid‚Äôs winning goal at the 4 Nations Face-Off finals

Connor McDavid and Auston Matthews have been credited with promoting the return of best-on-best hockey. As the No. 1 picks in the 2015 and 2016 NHL drafts, they were teased with a version of this during the 2016 World Cup of Hockey. However, they had never played for their respective countries at true best-on-best. Auston Matthews responded to McDavid's game-winning goal in the 4 Nations final with some blunt words.Auston Matthews excelled in the 4 Nations Face-Off final, scoring three points and two assists. He played over 20 minutes per game and missed a deflection on McDavid's goal, which led to a 3-2 loss to Canada.On Saturday, a reporter asked Auston Matthews if McDavid's goal haunted him to which Matthews simply replied, "Sure, Kevin." with a smile. Canada won their fourth consecutive international tournament with Connor McDavid's goal, while Matthews couldn't break up the play for the final goal."It's a great game. It's a great sport. And I hope we put on a good show these last couple days and gained some fans. Ultimately, you can't ask for a better show than that," Connor McDavid said after Canada's win.Nathan MacKinnon scored the first goal in the game, followed by Brady Tkachuk and Jake Sanderson. Sam Bennett tied the game 2-2. In overtime, McDavid scored the game-winner, and Jordan Binnington made 31 saves for Canada. USA defenseman Zach Werenski believes the team is close to Canada and believes they will win soon."It just makes us hungrier," Werenski said, via NHL.com. "We know now that we're neck and neck with Canada. We expect to be in those games with them and expect to win. I think that's exciting for this group. It gives us a lot of confidence that our time is coming, our time is now. It's exciting.‚ÄùAlso post: Florida Panthers forward Matthew Tkachuk is out of Saturday's game against Seattle Kraken due to a lower-body injury Auston Matthews expressed pride in his team despite the loss to Team Canada in the 4 Nations Face-Off final. Auston Matthews, who assisted on goals by Brady Tkachuk and Jake Sanderson, will now focus on the season ahead as Maple Leafs captain.
Article Summary: Auston matthews responded to connor mcdavid's game-winning goal in the 4 nations final with some blunt words. Matthews played over 20 minutes per game and missed a deflection on mcdavid‚Äôs goal, which led to a 3-2 loss to canada. Canada won their fourth consecutive international tournament.

Article Title: Will Nikola Jokic play tonight against the Indiana Pacers? Latest update on the Denver Nuggets star's injury report (February 24, 2025)
Article Text:
Denver Nuggets center Nikola Jokic, left, drives to the basket as Portland Trail Blazers forward Toumani Camara defends in the second half of an NBA basketball game Wednesday, Feb. 12, 2025, in Denver. (Image via AP Photo/David Zalubowski)

Denver Nuggets

Nikola Jokic

Is Nikola Jokic playing tonight? Denver Nuggets injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the Indiana Pacers

Nuggets injury report Feb 24 (Image via NBA)

Nikola Jokic‚Äôs influence on the Denver Nuggets squad

When and where to watch the Denver Nuggets play tonight (February 24, 2025)?

Theare set to face the Indiana Pacers on Monday, February 24, at Gainbridge Fieldhouse, but all eyes are on the injury report, particularly the status of reigning MVP. While Jokic isn‚Äôt listed on the injury report, his health remains a critical factor as the Nuggets navigate a challenging stretch with multiple key players sidelined. Nikola Jokic will be playing tonight for the Nuggets. The Nuggets have five players on the injury report, including Aaron Gordon (calf) and Jamal Murray (knee), both listed as probable. However, the team will be without DaRon Holmes (Achilles), Vlatko Cancar (knee), and Peyton Watson (knee), all ruled out for the upcoming game. Jokic, who has been a consistent force for Denver, averaging 24.4 points, 11.6 rebounds, and 10.3 assists over the last 20 games, will need to shoulder an even heavier load in their absence.Jokic‚Äôs dominance this season has been undeniable. He leads the Nuggets with 29.4 points per game, ranking third in the NBA, and his 12.7 rebounds per contest also place him third league-wide. His ability to elevate Denver‚Äôs offense, which ranks third in the NBA with 121.3 points per game, will be crucial against a Pacers team that allows 115.5 points per game (21st in the league).The Pacers, meanwhile, are dealing with their own injury woes. Myles Turner (neck) and James Johnson (illness) are out, while Isaiah Jackson (calf) is sidelined for the season. Despite these absences, Indiana remains competitive, led by Pascal Siakam‚Äôs 20.5 points per game and Tyrese Haliburton ‚Äôs playmaking, averaging 7.7 assists.The game tips off at 7:00 PM ET and will be broadcast on FDSIN, ALT, and KTVD, with live streaming available on Fubo. Fans can also stay engaged by participating in daily fantasy leagues on FanDuel.As the Nuggets aim to maintain their momentum in the Western Conference, Nikola Jokic‚Äôs health and performance will be pivotal. With Gordon and Murray likely available, Denver‚Äôs supporting cast must step up to alleviate the pressure on their star center.Also read: Will Tyrese Haliburton play tonight against the Denver Nuggets? Latest update on the Indiana Pacers star's injury report (February 24, 2025) For now, the Nuggets can breathe a sigh of relief as Jokic remains healthy, but his workload and the team‚Äôs ability to manage injuries will be key factors as they push toward the playoffs.
Article Summary: The denver nuggets face the indiana pacers on monday, february 24, at gainbridge fieldhouse. The game tips off at 7:00 pm et and will be broadcast on fdsin, alt, and ktvd, with live streaming available on fubo. Nikola jokic isn‚Äôt listed on the injury report, but his health remains a critical factor as the nuggets navigate a challenging stretch.

Article Title: 3 Reasons Why Cody Rhodes Would Accept The Rock‚Äôs Offer at WWE Elimination Chamber 2025
Article Text:
Image via WWE

3. Cody Rhodes has already shown signs of a heel



2. Greed to reach bigger heights of success



1. Homelander vs Cenation Leader storyline for WrestleMania 41

Also read:

Cody Rhodes might get enticed by The Rock 's offer and choose to accept it at the WWE Elimination Chamber 2025 event.Cody Rhodes has been a remarkable, Undisputed WWE Champion for almost a year. It has been noticed by every member of the WWE Universe, but unknown to all until now, The Rock was also paying close attention to his title reign. This led to The Final Boss returning to SmackDown last week and extending a lucrative offer to become his champion and take his career to the same level as The Rock.With Cody Rhodes asked to deliver his answer to The Rock at the WWE Elimination Chamber 2025, here are the three reasons Cody Rhodes would be enticed to accept his offer:The WWE Universe might have missed it, but the babyface and fan favorite Cody Rhodes has already dropped multiple signs of a heel turn over the last few months. The first was witnessed at the WWE Saturday Night's Main Event in December 2024 in his match against Kevin Owens when he picked up a controversial win by delivering the Cross Rhodes on him on a steel chair. He showed his remorseful side even in their ladder match at the Royal Rumble 2025 PLE and had no sympathy for beating down KO. This could have been the early signs of his heel turn, which would have been triggered by his accepting The Rock's offer at Elimination Chamber.As The Rock mentioned, Cody Rhodes has achieved immense success in his WWE career. But it is nowhere close to the worldwide fame commanded by The Final Boss. The Rock made it clear that Rhodes can have those same opportunities if he sells his soul to him. In the greed to claim more success and, as The Rock said, secure the future of his family, Cody Rhodes might just accept his offer.It is heavily rumored that John Cena is set to win the 2025 Men's Elimination Chamber match. In doing so, he will earn the opportunity to challenge Cody Rhodes for the Undisputed WWE Championship at WrestleMania 41 . With Cena on his farewell tour, he has been garnering huge positive reactions. This makes it a perfect scenario for Cody Rhodes to turn heel in their feud by becoming The Rock's Corporate Champion against the babyface Cena, making it more intriguing on the road to Las Vegas.
Article Summary: Cody rhodes has been a remarkable, undisputed wwe champion for almost a year. The rock made it clear that rhodes can have those same opportunities if he sells his soul to him. Cody rhodes might get enticed by the rock's offer and choose to accept it at the wwe elimination chamber 2025 event.

Article Title: Bruins Star Brad Marchand‚Äôs injury concerns grow after update from GM Don Sweeney
Article Text:
Image via AP

Bruins battle key injuries: Brad Marchand‚Äôs health, Hampus Lindholm‚Äôs absence, McAvoy Charlie‚Äôs recovery

Boston Bruins GM Don Sweeney has provided concerning updates on team captain Brad Marchand‚Äôs health. The star forward has been dealing with injuries throughout the season, raising concerns about his availability for key games.Brad Marchand had three surgeries in summer 2024 for elbow, groin, and abdomen issues but returned for the season opener. Concerns about his durability grew when he was kept out of overtime and the shootout against Ottawa, though coach Joe Sacco said it was a tactical decision. Fans remain worried about his long-term health.In addition to Marchand‚Äôs situation, the Bruins are also struggling with major injuries to key players. Hampus Lindholm, a crucial defenseman, is unlikely to return this season after undergoing surgery for a fractured patella. He sustained the injury during a game against the St. Louis Blues on November 12, 2024.According to Bruins insider Conor Ryan, Hampus Lindholm is ‚Äúunlikely‚Äù to return this season. ‚ÄúIt‚Äôs going to take a little more time to heal naturally and we don‚Äôt want to put a timeline on when he‚Äôll be back to 100 percent,‚Äù Sweeney stated, via NHL.com.Another significant setback is Charlie McAvoy, who remains hospitalized due to an infection and a serious right shoulder injury. He suffered an AC joint injury during the 4 Nations Face-Off tournament and later developed an infection that required treatment at Massachusetts General Hospital. There is no clear timeline for his return.Marchand‚Äôs health is crucial for the Bruins' playoff hopes.He is in the final year of his eight-year, $49 million contract.In the final year of his contract, he hopes to play until 40, but injuries and his future with the team remain uncertain.Also Read: New Jersey Devils Nico Daws recorded his first NHL shutout with 29 saves in a 5-0 victory over the Nashville Predators With important games ahead against teams like the Maple Leafs, Islanders, and Penguins, the Bruins will need Marchand at full strength. His leadership and scoring ability are crucial, but staying healthy will determine how much he can contribute. Additionally, with Lindholm and McAvoy sidelined, the Bruins‚Äô defense will need to step up in their absence to keep the team competitive.
Article Summary: Brad marchand had three surgeries in summer 2024 for elbow, groin, and abdomen issues. Hampus lindholm, a crucial defenseman, is unlikely to return this season after undergoing surgery for a fractured patella. Charlie mcavoy remains hospitalized due to an infection and a serious right shoulder injury.

Article Title: Will Joel Embiid play tonight against the Chicago Bulls? Latest update on the Philadelphia 76ers star's injury report (February 24, 2025)
Article Text:
Is Joel Embiid playing tonight? (Image via AP Photo/Matt Slocum)

Philadelphia 76ers

Joel Embiid

Is Joel Embiid playing tonight? Philadelphia 76ers injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the Chicago Bulls

76ers injury report Feb 24 (Image via NBA)

Chicago Bulls injury report for tonight‚Äôs game against the Philadelphia 76ers (February 24, 2025)

When and where to watch the Philadelphia 76ers play tonight against the Chicago Bulls (February 24, 2025)?

Theface mounting challenges as they prepare to host the Chicago Bulls on Monday, February 24, at the Wells Fargo Center. With six players listed on the injury report, including star center, the team‚Äôs prospects for the game remain uncertain. Embiid, a pivotal figure for the 76ers, is marked as questionable due to a knee injury, leaving fans and analysts speculating about his availability. Joel Embiid ‚Äôs potential absence could significantly impact the Philadelphia 76ers, who are already struggling with a 20-36 record this season. The reigning MVP has been a cornerstone of the team‚Äôs performance, and his limited presence on the court has coincided with the team‚Äôs recent struggles. Alongside Embiid, Tyrese Maxey, the team‚Äôs leading scorer with 27.4 points per game, is also questionable due to a finger injury. The duo‚Äôs uncertain status adds to the growing list of concerns for Philadelphia, which includes Jared McCain (out for the season), Eric Gordon (wrist), Kyle Lowry (hip), and Justin Edwards (ankle). The 76ers ‚Äô offensive output has been lackluster, averaging 108.9 points per game, ranking 26th in the league. Defensively, they allow 113.0 points per contest, placing then 14th. Without Joel Embiid and Maxey, the team‚Äôs ability to compete against the Bulls, who average 115.9 points per game (10th in the NBA), could be severely compromised.On the Bulls‚Äô side, injuries have also taken a toll, with Patrick Williams (knee), Ayo Dosunmu (shoulder), and Jalen Smith (face) ruled out. However, Coby White, who averages 12.8 points per game, is listed as probable despite an ankle issue. Chicago‚Äôs Nikola Vucevic, averaging 19.1 points and 10.3 rebounds per game, will likely pose a significant challenge for the 76ers‚Äô depleted lineup.The game, scheduled for 7:00 PM ET, will be broadcast on NBCS-PH and CHSN, with live streaming available on Fubo. As the 76ers navigate their injury woes, Joel Embiid‚Äôs status remains the focal point. His presence could provide a much-needed boost, but his absence would further highlight the team‚Äôs struggles in an already difficult season.Fans eagerly await updates on Embiid‚Äôs condition, as his availability could determine whether the 76ers can halt their downward spiral or if the Bulls will capitalize on their opponent‚Äôs vulnerabilities.
Article Summary: The philadelphia 76ers host the chicago bulls on monday, february 24, at the wells fargo center. The 76ers have six players listed on the injury report, including star center joel embiid. The reigning mvp is marked as questionable due to a knee injury. Tyrese maxey, the team‚Äôs leading scorer with 27.4 points per game, is also questionable.

Article Title: Tennis star Caroline Wozniacki‚Äôs throwback clip shines spotlight on NBA champion husband David Lee
Article Text:
Caroline Wozniacki and David Lee. Image via: Mike Coppola/ Getty Images

David Lee

Caroline Wozniacki gives a heartfelt tribute to her husband David Lee



Caroline Wozniacki David Lee. Image via: davidlee/Instagram

Danish tennis star Caroline Wozniacki recently took a trip down memory lane, sharing a throwback video of her husband, former NBA star. In the post, she shared Lee‚Äôs skills on the basketball court. The Danish tennis champion delighted fans by posting a clip of Lee playing at the legendary Rucker Park in New York. The video shared by the tennis standout showed her love and support for her husband as it left fans talking about their beautiful relationship.The video, originally shared by another account, was captioned: "When David Lee pulled up to Rucker Park and started cooking." Caroline Wozniacki reposted it on her Instagram story, adding three emojis.David Lee who has a two-time NBA All-Star under his belt, had a remarkable career that spanned over a decade. He began his journey with the New York Knicks before moving on to the Golden State Warriors, where he played a major role in their 2015 NBA Championship victory. Later, he had his tenure with the Boston Celtics and San Antonio Spurs before retiring in 2017.Wozniacki and Lee got married in 2019. The duo share two children, Olivia Wozniacki Lee and James Wozniacki Lee. Wozniacki forged her legacy in tennis, winning 30 WTA titles and capturing her maiden Grand Slam title at the 2018 Australian Open.Previously, Wozniacki also made headlines following her withdrawal from the 2024 Australian Open. The tournament was indeed special for the star as it was the site of her most significant career accolade when she defeated Simona Halep in a three-set thriller to win her first and only Grand Slam title.The 34-year-old‚Äôs name was initially on the entry list but it was later crossed out. Wozniacki did not immediately provide a reason for pulling out. However, she later addressed the issue during a presentation ceremony at the tournament, where she brought out the Daphne Akhurst Memorial Cup.Speaking to Eurosport, Wozniacki revealed that her battle with rheumatoid arthritis had impacted her ability to train effectively ahead of the season‚Äôs first Grand Slam. ‚ÄúMy body was not feeling great. When I started pre-season training, I was struggling with my body a little bit,‚Äù she admitted. ‚ÄúI have rheumatoid arthritis, so it‚Äôs been an ongoing battle, but I am hoping with a little break I will be back again soon.‚ÄùAlso Read: Orlando Magic coach‚Äôs recollection of Luka Doncic‚Äôs work ethic shows big Dallas Maverick loss after shocking NBA trade Wozniacki has no plans to retire again. After making a comeback in 2023, she proved she still could compete as she reached the fourth round of the US Open before falling to eventual champion Coco Gauff. Her 2024 season had its ups and downs, with a 16-13 record in 29 matches.
Article Summary: Caroline wozniacki shared a throwback video of her husband, former nba star david lee. In the post, she shared lee‚Äôs skills on the basketball court. The danish tennis champion delighted fans by posting a clip of lee playing at the legendary rucker park in new york.

"I want Bailey to enjoy every second of this. And when someone asks her, ‚ÄòWhat‚Äôs your mom do?‚Äô I want her eyes to light up as she tells that person everything she‚Äôs absorbed,"

The Players‚Äô Tribune

"She‚Äôs only 4, so I won‚Äôt lie: She used to cry during some of the shows because she thought I was getting beat up. (I felt so bad!!) But now Bailey can‚Äôt get enough of it,"

Dynamite

Rampage

Brandon Phillips comes from a family of athletes‚Äîhis siblings have made names for themselves too

Porsha Phillips: His younger sister played in the WNBA for the San Antonio Silver Stars.



P.J. Phillips: His younger brother became manager of the New Jersey Jackals in 2022.



Jamil Phillips: His older brother played for the Texas Rangers and later founded Legacy Arena Baseball, a training club for young athletes.



"The Phillips family provided us with great athletes but also provided us with great kids. Everything they got they earned."

Brandon Phillips‚Äô net worth and earnings from his MLB career and business ventures

Jade Cargill and Brandon Phillips have been together since 2015, but no one knows when they actually got married

Read More:

Jade Cargill and former Cincinnati Reds second baseman Brandon Phillips didn‚Äôt plan to cross paths, but when they did, it clicked instantly. Their first meeting? A Starbucks run-in that sounds straight out of a rom-com.Cargill wrote forin 2022.Since then, they‚Äôve been inseparable, supporting each other‚Äôs careers and even co-owning a professional softball team. The exact timeline of their marriage is unknown, but their relationship is anything but low-key. Cargill has publicly supported Phillips, wearing his iconic Boston Red Sox jersey during an interview. Phillips, on the other hand, has made it clear that this stage of his life is about lifting up his wife.Phillips said in an interview.Brandon Phillips isn‚Äôt just another retired athlete‚Äîhe‚Äôs a Cincinnati Reds legend. His MLB career lasted 16 seasons, starting with the Cleveland Indians in 2002. But it was with the Cincinnati Reds from 2006 to 2016 that he truly became a star.Phillips played second base like it was second nature. He had 2,029 hits, 211 home runs, and 951 RBIs, earning multiple Gold Gloves and All-Star nods. His defensive skills? Insane. His ability to turn double plays? Effortless. Reds fans still talk about his contributions to the team.He wrapped up his MLB career with short stints at the Atlanta Braves, Los Angeles Angels, and Boston Red Sox before officially stepping away in 2018. His last stop? A brief, but memorable, run with the Boston Red Sox, which he described as anand praised for its strong team culture.Some couples get matching tattoos. Brandon Phillips and Jade Cargill bought a professional sports team.Since 2022, they‚Äôve been co-owners of, a team in Women‚Äôs Professional Fastpitch. Phillips wanted a name that would stand out.he explained.It worked. In their debut season,won the Women‚Äôs Professional Fastpitch championship, proving that Phillips and Cargill weren‚Äôt just running a team for show.Cargill said.Phillips took it a step further, saying,Owning one team wasn‚Äôt enough. In 2021, Brandon Phillips became part-owner of the Lexington Legends, a minor league baseball team. He wasn‚Äôt just there for business‚Äîhe even played for the team, making him the first-ever player-owner in the Atlantic League.Lexington Legends president Andy Shea hyped up Phillips‚Äô impact.Shea said.Jade Cargill and Brandon Phillips welcomed their daughter, Bailey Quinn Phillips, in 2017. Cargill has always been vocal about wanting to set an example for her.Cargill wrote inBut here‚Äôs the twist: Bailey wasn‚Äôt always a fan of her mom‚Äôs job.Cargill shared.Now? She watches, and every pay-per-view. Wrestling might just run in the family at this point.Brandon Phillips isn‚Äôt the only athlete in his family. His siblings turned sports into a family business.The Phillips siblings were inducted into their high school‚Äôs hall of fame in 2022. Their former coach, Gregg Goodwin, summed it up best:Brandon Phillips‚Äô net worth is estimated at $40 million as of 2024. Most of it comes from his MLB career, where he played for multiple teams but made the biggest impact with the Cincinnati Reds.His ten seasons in Cincinnati made him one of the best second basemen of his era. Beyond baseball, his earnings come from team ownerships and business ventures, proving that he knows how to keep the money flowing post-retirement.Jade Cargill and Brandon Phillips met in 2015. They‚Äôve been together ever since. They have a daughter. They own a sports team. They support each other publicly.But when did they actually get married? That part remains unclear. Reports suggest they‚Äôve been married for a while, but the couple hasn‚Äôt shared a date. If they ever decide to drop that information, it'll probably be in the most casual way possible‚Äîjust like the way they met.
Article Summary: Brandon phillips and jade cargill co-own the texas smoke, a professional women‚Äôs softball team. Phillips is also part-owner of the lexington legends baseball team. The couple have been together since 2015, but no one knows when they actually got married. Jade cargill and brandon phillips met in 2015 and have been together ever since.

Article Title: Tua Tagovailoa‚Äôs tenure with the Dolphins might come to an end as the team might replace the QB by drafting Jalen Milroe
Article Text:
Image via Getty Images

Jalen Milroe might replace Tua Tagovailoa

Jalen Milroe , despite a subpar 2024 season at Alabama, is a promising quarterback prospect in the 2025 NFL Draft. If he finds the right scheme, he could become a franchise quarterback. Tua Tagovailoa , currently the Miami Dolphins quarterback, may be considering a move due to concussions and inconsistent performances.Tua Tagovailoa, a Dolphins quarterback, has a decent record with 15,760 yards and 101 touchdowns over five years. However, he has thrown 45 interceptions and taken 113 sacks. In the lone playoff game against the Kansas City Chiefs, he failed under pressure, completing 51.3% of his passes for 199 yards and a touchdown.Tagovailoa is a game-managing quarterback with mobility to avoid pressure but not necessarily take off and win on the ground. Mike McDaniel's system hides his inefficiencies, as he lacks arm strength to consistently throw the ball down the field.McDaniel's scheme helps condense the field, make reads easier, and have more routes schemed open underneath. However, this works against weaker defenses, which are not the recipe for success for the Dolphins to win a championship. A new quarterback under center is needed.Jalen Milroe, a talented quarterback from Alabama, demonstrated advanced IQ through pump fakes and eye movement, resulting in 2,834 yards, 16 touchdowns, and 11 interceptions. His rushing ability, which included 879 yards and 20 touchdowns on the ground, opened up opportunities for the Miami offense that uses RPOs and play action. Milroe's versatility on the ground would improve offensive efficiency, as he could disguise plays better and open up opportunities for the Miami offense.Milroe, a talented quarterback, has shown the ability to open up through the air and has accurate throwing abilities. His anticipation helps him lead receivers and adjust under pressure. Despite a drop in stock due to sporadic play and inconsistency in the Senior Bowl, the upside is there. The Dolphins will likely choose Milroe as their franchise quarterback, similar to Anthony Richardson, and it will depend on the right team's draft.Also Read: ‚ÄúHe can't do anything‚Äù: AJ Brown expressed skepticism about Travis Hunter's dual-player ambitions Jalen Milroe was a junior at Tompkins High School in Katy, Texas, and threw for 2,689 yards and 29 touchdowns as a junior. He also rushed for eight touchdowns and 378 yards. As a senior, he passed for 1,136 yards and 13 touchdowns. Milroe led Tompkins to over 30 wins in three seasons.
Article Summary: Jalen milroe, a talented quarterback from alabama, demonstrated advanced iq through pump fakes and eye movement. The dolphins will likely choose milroe as their franchise quarterback, similar to anthony richardson. Despite a drop in stock due to sporadic play and inconsistency in the senior bowl, the upside is there.

Article Title: WWE Announcer Lilian Garcia Hangs Out With LA Knight and Damian Priest Before Dropping a Trish Stratus Teaser
Article Text:
(Image Via Getty)

Lilian Garcia's night out with her SmackDown friends



Lilian Garcia teases a pretty exciting possibility for Toronto



SmackDown's very own Lilian Garcia is a face and voice we all know and love. Her commentaries and announcements have become the spark of the show, and it's apparent that the stars who have been part of SmackDown equally adore and admire her for being there with them through it all. Recently, WWE stars LA Knight and Damian Priest were both seen hanging out with her in New Orleans, and fans are loving their friendship. Lilian Garcia was recently seen hanging out with her friends from the ring, recent SmackDown joinee Damian Priest, and a friend of a friend, also known as LA Knight. The three stars posed for a photo on their night out in New Orleans, looking happy and seemingly having fun. The ring announced took to her X (formerly Twitter) account to repost a picture of the three of them, writing:"Co-workers have become some of my best friends among the years. So getting to hang with Damien, LA and others in New Orleans was so fun! üòÅüéâ"The SmackDown roster is quite close-knit, and it shows in how well they get along, not just with each other but also with other crew members like Garcia.It's not just LA Knight and Damian Priest that Lilian Garcia was seen hanging out with. Garcia gave fans another very exciting possibility to look forward to - Trish Stratus . Garcia could be seen alongside Stratus , and they teased fans that Toronto's very own could be seen during the show on March 1.The two were catching up after a pretty exciting night for Garcia when she got to announce The Rock after almost 20 years. And then the two women took to conspire against the fans when Garcia said, "Hopefully, I get to announce you soon," to which Stratus replied with a cheeky "Maybe Toronto."It looks like Trish Stratus could be present in her hometown during the Elimination Chamber night, which is being held in Toronto this year. Fingers crossed, we will be waiting to see what more exciting bits of news come our way. WWE Elimination Chamber 2025 will be aired on March 1.Also Read: 3 Bookings For Trish Stratus After Rumored Appearance at WWE Elimination Chamber 2025
Article Summary: Lilian garcia was recently seen hanging out with her friends from the ring, recent smackdown joinee damian priest, and a friend of a friend, also known as la knight. The three stars posed for a photo on their night out in new orleans, looking happy and seemingly having fun.

Article Title: Kevin Durant Shuts Down Rumors About $60M Rapper‚Äôs Kendrick Lamar Beef: Here‚Äôs Why
Article Text:
Credits: NBA and Getty Images

Kevin Durant's No-Look Pass on Hip-Hop Beef: Why KD Isn't Here for the "Fake Tough Guy" Stuff

From alley-oops to hot takes, Kevin Durant is known for his smooth moves on and off the court. He's a hoops legend, a social media maven, and apparently, a hip-hop head with some strong opinions. While KD‚Äôs known to rep Drake (who, let‚Äôs be real, probably has a custom-made OVO jersey just for KD), he‚Äôs now weighing in on the Kendrick Lamar-J. Cole's situation, and he's not holding back. This isn‚Äôt just your average sports commentator dabbling in music this is a full-court press on hip-hop culture.Over the weekend, Durant dribbled his way into the discourse surrounding J. Cole 's new single, CLOUDs, released via Cole's blog. Durant‚Äôs tweet, a swift and decisive crossover move, read: "I don't care bout none of that fake tough guy shit. This is mastery." Now, what‚Äôs so special about this track? It‚Äôs Cole‚Äôs first release since Port Antonio in October 2024, and it comes amidst the lingering fallout from his brief entanglement in the Drake-Kendrick Lamar beef.Remember last April? Kendrick dropped some lyrical bombs on both Drake and Cole in Future and Metro Boomin‚Äôs Like That. Cole responded with 7 Minute Drill, a diss track aimed at Lamar. But, in a move that shocked fans, Cole pulled the song from streaming services and publicly apologized to Kendrick. This apology, while perhaps showing maturity, also opened Cole up to criticism, with many labeling him as soft. Durant, however, isn‚Äôt buying into the "fake tough guy" narrative. He‚Äôs clearly impressed by Cole's artistry, and he's not afraid to say it, even if it means going against the grain.Durant's tweet isn‚Äôt just about CLOUDs. It seems to be a broader statement about the culture of hip-hop and the pressure artists face to maintain a certain image. KD, who's seen his share of tough competition on the court, recognizes true skill and artistry when he sees it, regardless of the surrounding drama. He's essentially saying, "Forget the beef, focus on the bars."ALSO READ: Miami Heat vs. Milwaukee Bucks Game Preview (02/23): Starting Five, Injury Report, Start Time, How to Watch, and More NBA star Kevin Durant recently shared his perspectives on rapper Kendrick Lamar , continuing his engagement with hip-hop culture. This follows his earlier commentary on Kendrick's Super Bowl halftime performance earlier this month. Durant has demonstrated himself to be more than just a casual listener of hip-hop music, showing deep investment in the culture and genuine appreciation for the art form. His involvement highlights the growing connection between professional sports and popular culture, as Durant continues to provide his insights on music alongside his basketball career.
Article Summary: Kevin durant tweeted about j. cole's new single, clouds. It's cole's first release since port antonio in october 2024. Cole responded with 7 minute drill, a diss track aimed at kendrick lamar. This follows his earlier commentary on kendrick's super bowl halftime performance.

Article Title: "I couldn't help myself": Freddie Freeman set for Cactus League debut after Ankle Surgery
Article Text:
Image via: Getty Images

Freddie Freeman Returns to Action After Ankle Surgery, Eyes on Tokyo Opener



If he had come to the Cactus League by himself, it would have given Dodger fans some reason to breathe-easily; Freddie Freeman is set to Cactus League debut this Thursday! After a winter of uncertainty with ankle surgery , Freeman is finally on his way back to the diamond, and the buzz is building. Almost too perfectly, this works out with prep for the season opener against the Cubs in Tokyo.It has been a slow but steady process for Freeman. Since the surgery on his right ankle in December, the veteran first baseman has taken it easy during spring training camp with the Dodgers . Every pro athlete knows not to rush back from injury, but Dave Roberts sees an optimistic progress with Freeman."The plan is for Freddie Freeman to play on Thursday." This week is obviously an important week for the rehab process leading into the Cactus League. He will step up to the plate against the Rockies for his first official action in spring training. And although this will still qualify as a light workout, there is no doubt he will be revved up. After months of waiting, he is now almost back on track.‚ÄúI don‚Äôt think I will be in the games at the beginning. It looks like I‚Äôm going to start a running progression right when I get to spring training,‚Äù Freeman said at DogerFest. ‚ÄúAs of right now, I am on track to be able to play in Tokyo.‚Äù Once the Dodgers began spring camp, Freeman‚Äôs excitement for the 2025 season was evident as he even broke some recovery rules. ‚ÄúI wasn‚Äôt supposed to swing today, but I swung,‚Äù Freeman said. ‚ÄúI couldn‚Äôt help myself.‚ÄùFreeman's Cactus League debut isn‚Äôt just a feel-good moment for the team and fans‚Äîit‚Äôs a countdown to the season opener. The Dodgers are gearing up for their two-game series in Tokyo against the Cubs, starting March 18. Despite a slower start to camp, Freeman is expected to be ready for that international showdown.All signs point to a return to form for Freeman‚Äîget ready for some fun baseball ahead!
Article Summary: Freddie freeman is set to make his cactus league debut on thursday. The veteran first baseman had ankle surgery in december. The dodgers are gearing up for their two-game series in tokyo against the cubs, starting march 18. Despite a slower start to camp, freeman is expected to be ready for that international showdown.

Article Title: ‚ÄúMoney talks‚Äù: Fans calls out Vladimir Guerrero Jr. as money-minded for ditching Yankees
Article Text:
Image via: Mark Goldman/Getty Images



Vladimir Guerrero Jr. Sparks Debate: Is He Playing the Yankees Card for a Bigger Paycheck?



"Money Talks and Bulls Walk": Fans Aren't Having It



Rumors in the MLB never settle down for long. There have been many whispers surrounding Guerrero Jr. and his future for most of the offseason, with Toronto Blue Jays fans and fans from all other circles hanging on his every word. Then, just when things looked like they were fading away, Vladimir put the kettle back on.Recently, Guerrero's interview found its way to raise some eyebrows, given his humor about loyalty to the team in light of the whispers that maybe he had a change of heart ‚Äî and of course, money had to be brought into it. Starring Vladimir Guerrero Jr. decided to attack these rumors about his future head-on for a change.The slugger had fans scared he might head for the Bronx and was ready to clear the air. "If I go to free agency, every team ‚Äî all 30 teams ‚Äî will have an opportunity to sit down with me, to talk to me." So, he kind of said that he doesn't mind exploring his options but is not in a hurry to leave Toronto.Contrastingly, as usual, some fans read between the lines, and the discussion very quickly turned into a debate about Vlad's loyalty. Some others were quick to point out that he has probably got his newfound "leverage" in the negotiation game.Guerrero Jr. made things clear; fans refused to believe him. He had been quite vocal about never playing for the Yankees ‚Äî until now. A handful of fans echoed the sentiment that this is just Vlad's attempt to drive up his market value. "He said once upon a time never the Yankees, but money talks and bulls walk," one user commented, calling out Vlad for what they felt was an obvious attempt at using the Yankees name to secure a bigger payday.Some fans commented, "What's he supposed to say? Of course, he is going to keep his options open." Others were more adamant: "Vlad would be silly not to. He wants that huge contract and the Yankees help drive up the max value most likely." Fans believe this is all business. Guerrero Jr. is just trying to maneuver for his advantage, with free agency approaching shortly.For some reason, fans think that what Vlad comments is just another form of the game: using the Yankees' name to fuel speculations to raise his asking price for an age-old tactic, and there is no reason to think Guerrero Jr. is any different. After all, he knows where the money is - and that is not just in Toronto. Many believe the slugger has been maintaining this image of being pursued for the biggest contract possible with rumors of Yankee interest.And then there are a few thoughts otherwise: Maybe, just maybe, Guerrero Jr. is legitimately leaving his options open, as he said. The Blue Jays have attempted to fortify the roster, and perhaps, with additional talent like Anthony Santander, the team can keep him for the long term. But as per fans, invoking the Yankees is just a cool bargaining tactic that would only rest on his value.In the end, the fan reaction is clear: Guerrero Jr. is playing the game with free agency in view, and it's all about value. Whether he is really leaving Toronto or just using the Yankees to raise his contract value is still debatable. But one thing is for sure, "money talks," and it is doing so very loudly at the moment.Vladimir Guerrero Jr. sparks speculation about his future, with fans debating whether his mention of free agency and the Yankees is a strategy to boost his market value or genuine interest.
Article Summary: Vladimir guerrero jr. sparked speculation about his future with a recent interview. Some fans believe he is just trying to maneuver for his advantage, with free agency approaching. Others think it is just another form of the game: using the yankees' name.

Article Title: ‚ÄúWhy would they do that?‚Äù: Khris Middleton lets his disappointment known after Milwaukee Bucks traded him for Kyle Kuzma
Article Text:
Khris Middleton. Image via: Getty Images

Khris Middleton

Milwaukee Bucks to the

Washington Wizards

Khris Middleton was disappointed after the Milwaukee Bucks traded him to the Washington Wizards

The recent NBA trades have received baffling reactions all around. While the Luka Doncic trade was the highlight and generated wide attention,‚Äôs surprising trade from thealso grabbed headlines. The Bucks were in a rush to acquire Kyle Kuzma for which they had to let go of Middleton. Recently the former Bucks forward shared his candid thoughts on his trade sharing his disappointment with a heavy heart. Khris Middleton recently opened up about the emotional toll of being traded from the Milwaukee Bucks, a team he once believed would be his home for life. Speaking to The Athletic‚Äôs Eric Nehm, the former NBA champion admitted he‚Äôs still processing the move. "Yeah, it's a range," Middleton said."Like, it's a cycle I go through a lot of times. I'm trying to get out of that cycle now because it's over with, and there's no point of really going down that path. But definitely anger. Definitely like sadness. Like denial, 'Why would they do that?' Questioning their decision and stuff like that," he continued.However, he acknowledged Buck's decision as the end of the day, it is business over emotion. "I mean, I could say my time could have ran out a long time ago. They held onto me, believed in the potential, believed in the work that they saw. But I think this time, it was just, we think a different route is better for our team going forward. And I can't do nothing but respect that," he added.Following his departure from the Bucks, the 33-year-old shared a heartfelt message on social media. ‚ÄúTwelve years ago, I arrived in this city as a young player with big dreams. Today, I leave as an NBA champion, 3x All-Star, an Olympic gold medalist, and most importantly, someone who Milwaukee helped shape into the person and player I am today,‚Äù he wrote in a goodbye message for his former team.He continued, ‚ÄúFrom the moment I stepped foot in this city, you embraced me. Together, we experienced the rebuilding years, the emergence of a championship contender,and ultimately, the unforgettable journey to the 2021 NBA Championship. That magical run will stay with me forever - the late-game shots, the comeback victories, and most importantly, bringing the Larry O'Brien Trophy back to Milwaukee after 50 years.‚ÄùMiddleton also wrote a heartfelt message to Bucks fans, ‚ÄúYour passion and support through every up and down has been nothing short of amazing. From the early days at the Bradley Center, to the energy at Fiserv Forum and the packed Deer District during our championship run - the way this entire city rallies behind its team is something special that I'll always cherish.‚ÄùAlso Read: Orlando Magic coach‚Äôs recollection of Luka Doncic‚Äôs work ethic shows big Dallas Maverick loss after shocking NBA trade However, he asserted that it was not a goodbye, but rather a big ‚Äúthank you‚Äù from his heart saying that the team will always have a special place in him but the new chapter of his career with the Wizards, as Middleton shared, was also exciting for him.
Article Summary: Khris middleton was traded from the milwaukee bucks to the washington wizards. The bucks were in a rush to acquire kyle kuzma for which they had to let go of middleton. The former nba champion admitted he‚Äôs still processing the move.
